body_html: Thank you for your quick response! The code runs fine on CPU(pytorch 0.4) but not GPU(0.4). Thats what confused me.. For the bug you mentioned, it does set back to train as far as i am aware.(line 307,383)

body: Thank you for your quick response! The code runs fine on CPU(pytorch 0.4) but not GPU(0.4). Thats what confused me.. For the bug you mentioned, it does set back to train as far as i am aware.(line 307,383)
